Command.Desc: Displays the loot of the current hunt.
Displays the loot of the specified hunt.
Displays the loot of the specified creature.
Displays the stats of the specified creature.
Closes all open windows and notifications.
Opens the last active notification.
Deletes all [creaturename] kills from the active hunt.
Deletes all creatures with less than [#kills] from the active hunt.
Adds a skin item of [creatuername] to the active hunt.
skin@[creaturename]; creature is the skinnable monster with highest kills.
Displays information about the city [cityname].
Displays information about the hunt [huntname].
Displays all hunts in the level-range 80%-120% of level.
Displays all hunts in the city [cityname].
Displays all hunts with [creaturename].
Displays information about the NPC [npcname].
Displays a notification with the current experience per hour.
Displays the current damage meter for players.
Displays the damage meter for creatures.
Displays the healing meter for players.
Displays the damage taken for players.
Clears the currently active hunt, deleting all loot.
Clears the hunt [huntname].
Deletes all log messages older than [time] in the active hunt.
Switches the active hunt to [huntname].
Displays information about the item [itemname].
Displays all items in the category [itemcategory].
Opens the Tibia character page of [charname] in a browser.
Searches for [searchterm] on tibia.wikia.com in a browser.
Execute the last message send in chat by any player.
Displays a list of all recently send messages in chat.
Displays a list of all recent urls send in chat.
Opens the last url send by [charname] in a browser.
Displays information about the spell [spellname].
Displays all spells that can be learned by [vocation].
Displays information about the outfit [outfitname].
Displays information about the mount [mountname].
Displays information about the quest [questname].
Displays all quests in [cityname].
Takes a screenshot of Tibia and saves it to the Screenshot folder.
Displays a NPC that buys/sells [itemname] in [cityname].
Displays a NPC that teaches [spellname] in [cityname].
Displays the specified HUD.
Closes the specified HUD.
Adds the specified amount of items to the used items of the active hunt.
Adds the specified amount of items to the loot of the active hunt.
Displays a notification that contains summary information (loot, experience, recent drops).
Displays a graph of experience gained over time.
Displays all used items of the current hunt.
Displays a reminder after [time] with [title] and [message] and [icon].
